definition: camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for

sentences.english: I think we should let Sylvia go camping with her boy-friend.
sentences.chinese: 我认为我们应该让Sylvia和她男友一起去宿营。

sentences.english: Two downtown Portland parks where Occupy Portland demonstrators camped for weeks are clear Monday and police say crews will be removing debris and assessing damage.
sentences.chinese: 波特兰两个示威者宿营的城市公园在周一得到了清理。

sentences.english: English: How do I book a camping site?
sentences.chinese: 请问我应该怎样预定一个宿营车位？

sentences.english: They were encamped in the tents.
Your bivouac for the night is the spot where you got tired of marching that day.
sentences.chinese: 你夜间的宿营地是你白天行军累了的处所。
在人生征途的露宿营地。

sentences.english: So I'm always looking for a place to keep my camp.
sentences.chinese: 所以我总是要寻找可以宿营的地方。

sentences.english: In my best Slovak, I asked, “Where is a campground?”
sentences.chinese: 我用最拿手的斯洛伐克语问，“宿营地在哪儿？”

sentences.english: It was too dark to go on, so we camped there.
sentences.chinese: 天太黑不能再走了，我们只好就地宿营。

sentences.english: The soldiers were bivouacked in the woods.
sentences.chinese: 战士们被安排在树林里宿营。

sentences.english: But now the campers all had outboards.
sentences.chinese: 可现在宿营者用的全是尾挂马达。

sentences.english: I wanted to camp out here. I soon realized I was out of balance.
sentences.chinese: 我想宿营在这里的野外，突然我意识到我失去了平衡。

sentences.english: They camped on the shore of Lake Bala.
We like to camp on the flats near the lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们想要在湖边的平地上宿营。

sentences.english: Their reasons for taking part in the protest and the long-term camping in urban areas vary.
sentences.chinese: 他们参加抗议以及在市区长期宿营的理由各不相同。

sentences.english: The billet is held in place in the die by a hold-down ring.
sentences.chinese: 宿营由压制圆环拿着到位在模子。

definition: to camp/to pitch camp/stationed/quartered/Taiwan pr. [zha2 ying2]
to set up camp/Taiwan pr. [an1 ying2 zha2 zhai4]
to sleep outdoors/to spend the night in the open
